hc_add_series.numeric ‘hc_add_series‘ for numeric objects

#### Description 

``hc_add_series`` for numeric objects
Usage
## S3 method for class 'numeric'

* ``hc ``: A highchart htmlwidget object.
data A numeric object
* ``...``: Arguments defined in http://api.highcharts.com/highcharts#chart.
